overview:
MITEN MEHTA Co-Founder & Chief Operating Officer KloudData, Inc D: +1 510 248 0601| M: +1 510 456 6828 mitenm@klouddata.com Skype: mitenmehta linkedin.com/in/mitenmehta

• Miten is Co-Founder and Chief Operating Officer for KloudData, Inc, a Silicon Valley based leading technology start-up that offers BigData Analytics on Cloud solutions to Fortune 2000 companies. • Miten was also Co-Founder and COO of eComLive a Silicon Valley Start-up in web collaboration / community space and led its acquisition by InfoSpace in 2000. As Vice President of InfoSpace from Jan 2000 to 2003, he led International expansion through partnership with mobile operators in Europe and Asia / Pac. • Prior to KloudData, Miten ran International Market Development for Financial Technologies Group from 2006 to 2010, and played a pivotal role in establishing and positioning MCX in India, SMX in Singapore, and GBOT in Mauritius, DGCX in Dubai, BFX in Bahrain and Bourse Africa in Botswana among the global leading exchanges in Emerging markets from Asia to Africa. • He was earlier Co-Founder & COO of MoConDi out of London and led its acquisition by Mobile Media in 2006. • Miten worked earlier in his career with Qualcomm (Kyocera division) and helped launch first SmartPhone PDQ in partnership with Palm • Miten has served as advisor to Cronus Ventures and invested in iPsh (acquired by Omnicom) and advised JP Mobile (acquired by Good). He was also an Investor and Advisor in Source Ventures (for PlaySpan – acquired by Visa in 2011). • Miten has been a Charter Member of TIE (Silicon Valley) since late 90’s, an angel investor and advisor in several companies and active member of Y combinatory, Founder Institute, LSM and several other accelerators in bay area.
